E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1988
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
It's been a hard decision, but I think I will retire
after this season. It's time to let the youngsters
take my job.

Regards,
Enzo Hernandez



Date: Saturday, 4/5/1988
Subject: Mickey Hatcher learns new position
Mickey Hatcher has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Second Base.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director
